$description: | What does this do? | Configures settings that control joining devices to Azure AD. The baseline allows only the groups "Baseline - Device Enrollers" and "Baseline - Microsoft 365 Users" to join devices to Azure AD. These groups may join up to 100 devices and are required to perform MFA when joining the device. | | Why should you use this? | If you want to restrict the ability to join devices to Azure AD to only authorized groups and require MFA. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. Only authorized groups may join devices, and users in those groups will be prompted for MFA to join. | | Learn more | N/A |
description: Tenant-wide policy that manages initial provisioning controls using quota restrictions, additional authentication and authorization checks
